Class.ClassComment:
CacheEntryInvalidatedEvent /** * Notifies a listener of an invalidation event.

Eviction has no notion of pre/post event since 4.2.0.ALPHA4. This event is only raised once after the eviction has occurred with the pre event flag being false. * @author Manik Surtani * @since 4.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves the value of the entry being invalidated. * @return the value of the invalidated entry */
